Class BaseHazelCastStateTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.statetracker.hazelcast.BaseHazelCastStateTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HazelCastStateTracker

extends java.lang.Object
implements StateTracker
    Baseline hazelcast state tracker
